verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-unto יְדוּת֗וּן <S%H3038><s%> ye-du-Tun, to Jeduthun מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach only אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him upon God דּֽוּמִיָּ֣ה <S%H1747><s%> du-mi-Yah waiteth נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; Truly my soul מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, at יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti. from him [cometh] my salvation

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- only ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he צ֭וּרִי <S%H6697><s%> Tzu-ri He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> vi-shu-'a-Ti; and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> mis-gab-Bi, [he is] my defence לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אֶמּ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> em-Mot moved רַבָּֽה׃ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bah. I shall not be greatly

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֤נָה׀ <S%H575><s%> 'A-nah How תְּהֽוֹתְת֣וּ <S%H2050><s%> te-hot-Tu How long will ye imagine mischief עַל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אִישׁ֮ <S%H376><s%> 'ish A man תְּרָצְּח֪וּ <S%H7523><s%> te-ratz-tze-Chu you may murder כֻ֫לְּכֶ֥ם <S%H3605><s%> chul-le-Chem all כְּקִ֥יר <S%H7023><s%> ke-Kir wall נָט֑וּי <S%H5186><s%> na-Tui; all of you as a bowing גָּ֝דֵ֗ר <S%H1447><s%> ga-Der, fence הַדְּחוּיָֽה׃ <S%H1760><s%> had-de-chu-Yah. [shall ye be and as] a tottering

אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach only מִשְּׂאֵת֨וֹ׀ <S%H7613><s%> mis-se-'e-To from his excellency יָעֲצ֣וּ <S%H3289><s%> ya-'a-Tzu They only consult לְהַדִּיחַ֮ <S%H5080><s%> le-had-di-aCh to cast [him] down יִרְצ֪וּ <S%H7521><s%> yir-Tzu they delight כָ֫זָ֥ב <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav in lies בְּפִ֥יו <S%H6310><s%> be-Fiv with their mouth יְבָרֵ֑כוּ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-Re-chu; they bless וּ֝בְקִרְבָּ֗ם <S%H7130><s%> u-ve-kir-Bam, inwardly יְקַלְלוּ־ <S%H7043><s%> ye-kal-lu- but they curse סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach only לֵ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him thou only upon God דּ֣וֹמִּי <S%H1826><s%> Dom-mi wait נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; My soul כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מִ֝מֶּ֗נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu, For תִּקְוָתִֽי׃ <S%H8615><s%> tik-va-Ti. for my expectation

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- only ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he צ֭וּרִי <S%H6697><s%> Tzu-ri He only [is] my rock וִֽישׁוּעָתִ֑י <S%H3444><s%> vi-shu-'a-Ti; and my salvation מִ֝שְׂגַּבִּ֗י <S%H4869><s%> mis-gab-Bi, [he is] my defence לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not אֶמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> em-Mot. I shall not be moved

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him In God יִשְׁעִ֣י <S%H3468><s%> yish-'I [is] my salvation וּכְבוֹדִ֑י <S%H3519><s%> u-che-vo-Di; and my glory צוּר־ <S%H6697><s%> tzur- the rock עֻזִּ֥י <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zi of my strength מַ֝חְסִ֗י <S%H4268><s%> mach-Si, [and] my refuge בֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> Be-lo-Him. [is] in God

בִּטְח֘וּ <S%H982><s%> bit-Chu Trust ב֤וֹ vo בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol- all עֵ֨ת׀ <S%H6256><s%> 'et in him at all times עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am, [ye] people שִׁפְכֽוּ־ <S%H8210><s%> shif-chu- pour out לְפָנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav before לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem; your heart אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him him God מַחֲסֶה־ <S%H4268><s%> ma-cha-seh- [is] a refuge לָּ֣נוּ La-nu סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. for us Selah

אַ֤ךְ׀ <S%H389><s%> 'ach are only הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> He-vel of low degree [are] vanity בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- afflicted אָדָם֮ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man כָּזָ֪ב <S%H3577><s%> ka-Zav of high degree [are] a lie בְּנֵ֫י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei afflicted אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish [and] men בְּמֹאזְנַ֥יִם <S%H3976><s%> be-mo-ze-Na-yim in the balance לַעֲל֑וֹת <S%H5927><s%> la-'a-Lot; to be laid הֵ֝֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, like מֵהֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> me-He-vel [lighter] than vanity יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> Ya-chad. they [are] altogether

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּבְטְח֣וּ <S%H982><s%> tiv-te-Chu Trust בְעֹשֶׁק֮ <S%H6233><s%> ve-'o-Shek not in oppression וּבְגָזֵ֪ל <S%H1498><s%> u-ve-ga-Zel in robbery אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֶּ֫הְבָּ֥לוּ <S%H1891><s%> teh-Ba-lu and become not vain חַ֤יִל׀ <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil if riches כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יָנ֑וּב <S%H5107><s%> ya-Nuv; increase אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תָּשִׁ֥יתוּ <S%H7896><s%> ta-Shi-tu set לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> Lev. not your heart

אַחַ֤ת׀ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat once דִּבֶּ֬ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath spoken אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God שְׁתַּֽיִם־ <S%H8147><s%> she-ta-yim- twice ז֥וּ <S%H2098><s%> zu this שָׁמָ֑עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma-'e-ti; have I heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki That עֹ֝֗ז <S%H5797><s%> 'Oz, that power לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him. [belongeth] unto God

וּלְךָֽ־ u-le-cha- אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai Also unto thee O Lord חָ֑סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Cha-sed; [belongeth] mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You תְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> te-shal-Lem for thou renderest לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish to every man כְּֽמַעֲשֵֽׂהוּ׃ <S%H4639><s%> Ke-ma-'a-Se-hu. according to his work
